weapon_description: This blade was once pure and pristine as a white dawn star, but it has since been tinted a deep, dark blue.
weapon_skill_description: Within 12s after an Elemental Skill is used, ATK is increased by 48%. During this time, when the equipping character has 0 Energy, ATK will be further increased by 48%, and CRIT DMG will be increased by 80%.
